shows.title: Catholic Mass with Student Cross
shows.desc:
Mass will be celebrated by Fr. Paul Smith from Brewood, and the music liturgy will be led by members of studentcross.org.uk.

Student Cross is an ecumenical Christian walking pilgrimage, traditionally for students but which now involves people of all ages, from young families to the retired. They look forward to sharing the liturgy with us at Greenbelt, minus the blisters!
